statements.name: PROC JAVAINFO
statements.description: Displays diagnostic information about the SAS Java environment.

arguments.name: ALL
arguments.description: lists current information about the SAS Java environment.

arguments.name: CLASSPATHS
arguments.description: lists information about the classpaths that Java is using.

arguments.name: HELP
arguments.description: provides usage assistance in using the JAVAINFO procedure.

arguments.name: JREOPTIONS
arguments.description:
lists the Java properties that are set when the JREOPTIONS configuration option is specified.
• When used in PROC JAVAINFO, JREOPTIONS specifies the JREOPTIONS Java properties that are set when Java is started.
• When used in PROC OPTIONS, JREOPTIONS specifies the Java options that are in the configuration file when SAS is started.

arguments.name: OS
arguments.description: lists information about the operating system that SAS is running under.

arguments.name: version
arguments.description: lists the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) that SAS is using.
